relation: Categories
Campus Safety
Clubs and Activities
Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
The campus is safely monitored by security guards that help patrol the campus and keep order. They also help escort you to an locations of your feel threatened or uneasy.
Chemistry Club Business Club Dental Hygiene Club MESA Club Pre-Med Club Veterans Club etc.. and many more

The library is a great place for studying sessions and tutoring classes are available as well. Speaking frequently with your adviser also helps significantly because they will help your keep you on track and give you with the academic plans you have established.
I have not experienced any unusual traditions yet because I am currently enrolling. But I am excited to see those usual traditions one day on the future.
The campus is definitely a good investment because they provide financial help for any person that applies as well as scholarships options and other sources of help for tuition and books.

There is certainly a diverse amount of programs that you can join on campus. From Christians groups to Athletic organizations. There is something for anyone to feel more involved and dedicated to the school with extracurricular programs.
Yakima Valley has a cafe available 5 days a week for any students. They provide various options for anyone's diet or food preferences.
The dorm life is tranquil and available for students that are interested in dorms in the campus.
The amount of academic rigor that the campus offers helps you develop essential abilities for any work force or study that you are pursuing.

Ask for help! If you have some questions that you would like to be answered, do not hesitate to ask for help. The welcoming staff at the campus are there to help you and guide you towards the right path for a successful future.

The Yakima Valley campus is a very relaxing and welcoming campus. They have an exceptional team of professors willing to dedicate 110% of there time and effort towards the success of each and every student. Yakima Valley truly shows interest in helping any student with a campus prepared to provide help for anyone at any time.
